A class that sorts gameObjects to trigger collisions only when needed.

Functions
CollisionsManager
private CollisionsManager()
ProcessCollisions
public void ProcessCollisions()

Main method to call once every frame. It will sort gameObjects and trigger needed collision effects.

DetermineBestAxis
protected int DetermineBestAxis()

Computes the room gameObjects's position variance and choose the axis with the largest value.

Returns

0 if X-axis variance is larger, 1 if Y-axis variance is larger.

IsBeforeOnBestAxis
protected bool IsBeforeOnBestAxis(
Collider collider1,
Collider collider2
)

Compares two collider and tell if one is before the other over bestAxis.

Parameter
axis

Axis used in calculations, use 0 for X-axis and 1 for Y-axis.

Returns

True is collider1's max value on the axis is stricly lower than collider2's min value.
